entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS app crash with MAUI 8.0.72 Xcode 15.4 simulator MacOS 14.7.1 #25756
  • Application display version not updating on Android #25755
  • [Performance issue] Creation and display of ContentView takes too long when displayed for the first time #25754
  • iOS BackButton Title cannot be set to string.Empty or "" #25742

Closed

  • It takes far too long for pull requests to be merged! #25747
  • Splash screen is displayed incorrectly in dark mode #19775
    Backlog
  • iOS Scrolling is super laggy #25753
  • dotnet publish -f net8.0-ios -c Release is way too slow #20090
  • FlyoutPage memory leaks - iOS, MacCatalyst #25505
  • ContentTemplate pages are not executing functions. #20777
  • Publishing MAUI App to the Store - The newly created provisioning profile is not listed, but the old ones are, and the "Download manual profiles" process has been done from Xcode #25741
  • Unable to debug MAUI Android app using `<AndroidDeviceUserId>10</AndroidDeviceUserId>` #25730
  • [NAA] Enable disable Exchange Legacy Tokens in your tenant #25733
  • The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen #25739
  • WebAuthenticator freezes in case when system kills app process #23622
  • BindableObjects not getting collected causing memory leak, android #24478
  • Toolbar is not displayed after deactive an app and activate it again. #24169
  • iOS singleton dependency injection wrong lifecycle #25501
  • .NET MAUI how to render HTML in Label #25211
  • .net maui help #25591
  • An Error #25546

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sr1 with ga #25752
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 4 #25751
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    community ✨
  • Fixed the Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    community ✨
  • Revamp new project template build/test script #25744
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-templates
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Revert CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #25738

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25740
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-templates, area-controls-switch
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for the screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage #25690
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25711
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #25731
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - improvements #25702
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, t/a11y
  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
    area-testing
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
